name: Bella Ciao: Solar Saudade
description:
NOTE: You must enable cache in your browser to be able to play the game!

You’re in your apartment in Mars, it’s currently the year 3020, and you had been through a lot lately, in an absolute need of a change of scenery. Lucky for you, you happen to be working as an freelance journalist, and it seems your friend, Carlo Lumini from MARS MEDIA has been trying to reach out for you, must be for another job following the trail for a story.

BELLA CIAO Solar Saudade, is a visual novel with a simple but deep RPG system, inspired in the agnostic pen and paper role playing games, with a sci-fi and noir touch. As the player, you must seek the truth behind the mysterious launching of a ship from Charon, a moon of Pluto, with destination unknown, although there are some suspicions.
